feed.title: Mount Carleton (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:19 AM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 08:19 AM AST Sunday 19 February 2023
